title: Bellator 232 live and official results
text:
Bellator 232 takes place Saturday, and you can join us for a live video stream and official results.

The event takes place at Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Conn. The main card streams on DAZN following prelims on MMA Junkie.

In the main event, welterweight champion Rory MacDonald (21-5-1 MMA, 3-1-1 BMMA) puts his title on the line against former champ Douglas Lima (31-7 MMA, 13-3 BMMA) in a fight that doubles as the final of Bellator’s welterweight grand prix tournament. The winner gets a $1 million bonus. In the co-feature, Paul Daley (41-17-2 MMA, 7-4 BMMA) meets short-notice welterweight replacement Saad Awad (23-12 MMA, 11-9 BMMA).

Official Bellator 232 results include:

MAIN CARD (DAZN, 10 p.m. ET)

Champ Rory MacDonald vs. Douglas Lima – for welterweight title, welterweight tournament final

Saad Awad vs. Paul Daley

Isaiah Chapman vs. Patrick Mix

Manny Muro vs. Nick Newell

Craig Campbell vs. Kevin Ferguson Jr.

PRELIMINARY CARD (MMA Junkie, 7:15 p.m. ET)
